front.title: Heavy Turbolaser Battery
front.gametext: Use 4 Force to deploy on your Star Cruiser. Adds 2 to power. May target a starship using 2 Force. Draw two destiny. Subtract 1 when targeting a capital starship. Otherwise, subtract 6. Target hit if total destiny > defense value.
front.lore: Built to penetrate the armor of the toughest Star Destroyers. Cooling technology pilfered from the Empire.

pulledBy: Lieutenant s'Too Vees (when at a docking bay)
